title: this person has high expectations this season (can't believe I saw this)
body:
Think I saw a member of my team driving around last week....
but seriously, pls tell me your guesses for what else this could even be a reference to. I was shocked when I saw it haha

twitch.tv/NynaeveNat

{{champion:99}}

replies.body: This is amazing.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=5i5mIhrv,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-01-29T01:57:14.174+0000)
>
> This is amazing.

You know what would be amazing? A rioter replying to serious thread for once

I feel like (for the most part), the only rioters allowed to answer serious threads are the highest ranking members of teams. While, this particular rioter is a part of the skins team, not associated with balance in any way.

If every rioter commented on serious threads, there would be conflicting opinions and things such as that. Then EVERYONE would hold it against the important guys when they contradict that opinion.

And, Riot does occasionally reply to serious threads, but some of them, honestly, aren't worth touching. I am sure Rioters discuss a LOT of what happens on the boards internally, even though they may not post stuff.
Downvote the haters! Rito, we need ~~an actual zed balance~~ more jokes! We need you to *make* more flippant threads, not just reply to them!
OMG, how many icepacks did this guy bring, cause he just got burned. I'm sorry, I'm a petty instigator.
Golden!
Dang, no offense riot. But you just got rekt m8.
You realize this Rioter probably does not have the right responses to your obviously life or death questions. So...Attacking this one solves nothing.
Higher than plastic tier.  This man is going places in S5, I can feel it!
Not that many places though with today's gas prices

...I'm sorry, have you been outside in the past month?

Stations near me: (Galloway, NJ)

1.839
2.029
1.739
1.839
1.719
1.739
1.719
1.899


Gas prices are *amazing* right now.
I'm in Canada, prices here are the same as they have been
Gas in my area went from $3.00 down to $2.40 in a matter of a couple days.THANK YOU NORTH DAKOTA FRACKING AND OBAMA

It's a political ploy by the middle eastern countries to under cut the Russian oil market, being that it is one of Russia's main exports, and it's causing the Russian economy to collapse significantly. Regardless if they are doing it to stop the Russians from reforming the USSR power house and wiping out the middle east's control, or in defense of their possible Ukrainian allies. Those of us in America can see that the oil industry is not healing due to the fact that items manufactured with oil products (such as plastics or rubber) still remain at a significantly high price. This shows that the raw oil is not being used in other economic sectors, displaying that the economy is indeed not deflating. If anything, the gas will rise back in prices if we don't start mining out our own oil.
Obama doesn't have anything to do with it. It's mostly Putin, in my mind. That, combined with the instability following the fall of the Saudi king has lead to significant reductions in oil cost.
The League of Legends Boards, tackling the big issues.
secretly this is a thread to promote Denny's.
haha damn...you caught me ;) hey free grand slam if it's your bday

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=avfUL9FZ8j0

asd

this is why i aint doing my placements till they fix it
i dont wanna be matched with these people ;/

...Someone in a game i had earlier today was like "i'm so dedicated that even my licence plate says Wood 5"
I either just found out what he was referencing...or found out what kind of vehicle he drives lol.
Man how do I get a Wood border for my load screen. Rito plz.
Well at least is Wood 5 and not Wood 6, he is aiming higher this year
https://vine.co/v/OTgiV5ujV7w
Vi started casting her ultimate before you started casting yours...

no, my red light of laser begins before strat moves for the vi ult. lol, although it is very close, regardless, ulting the gnar in the middle of a bunched up team, splitting them up was not ideal at the moment, it was just really ironic.
WoT?
Yes :) *tugs braid*
After years of playing, and getting to gold, and then almost diamond, I think I am in copper now... I wish I never quit, and took a break! I'm so bad ;(
Respect. Dude knows better than to play ranked.
Imagine if this guy drops below that...

Still ranked.
So it's a downgrade by default.
I was joking about Wood 5 in SC2 long before Rito redid their rank system!
how did {{champion:18}} launch {{champion:24}} like that?

OMG I wish I had a **poc** to show of the 
nvm I give up fuck tablets
